body:
Hey guys, spooks/Kibly here, this discussion is about what you think will be coming up in the new update which many have named the "Nise" update. 
     Personally, I think that the map developers will have worked very hard on creating more/better rotations including implementing tourney maps. 

So, WHAT DO YOU THINK?
body_tagged:
Hey guys, spooks/Kibly here, this discussion is about what you think will be coming up in the new update which many have named the "Nise" update.

So, WHAT DO YOU THINK?
title: "Nise Update" What do you think?

replies.body:
K...let's see how that turns out. I have my gripes with your ban, not because you're a friend, but because of the logic... 

*Goes on main while supposed to be banned* 
no one cares. 

*makes avi bantage* 
banned for ban evasion after going on main and playing regularly. You went on alts and played, there's no issue with that to my knowledge.
